title: Anyone else think another reason league is starting to lose entertainment
body:
Is because dedicating your time to 1 or 2 champions is risky business? 

if your character ends up being picked in lcs guess what? nerfs or permaban 

then you have to spend more time learning another character you can consistently win with that wont get shit on during the current meta if riot didn't make your character trash.

replies.body:
>if your character ends up being picked in lcs guess what?

if you are good at them then you should be able to play around the nerfs. unless they are heavily team reliant, in which case you signed up for that when you started to play them.

Or just get good enough with your chosen champions that a 2% change in global winrate does not effect you. This makes a lot more sense than shifting to whatever is statistically 'best', regardless of if you can even play it.
